title: About
text:
Raymond Liu Ao
Originally from Lima, Peru, I am a Philosophy, Politics, and Economics (PPE) student at the University of Pennsylvania. Interested in exploring the uses and implications of AI in daily life, this blog discusses how LLM can help us (or not) in commonly encountered scenarios.
–
